text: While in Baghdad, Nasrudin lost his donkey. After searching for several hours, the mule sat down to consider his fate in a tea room in the center of town. That's when he observed a crowd gathered next to the university. He went to investigate, and discovered his donkey surrounded by a group of scholars. Your donkey has done havoc in this honorable seat of knowledge. You're gonna have to pay a big fine. "No doubt", Nasrudin replied, "I will be the one to cover for you. I had a perfectly well-mannered donkey. Look at him now! After a few hours in this place, he's turned into a criminal. FIN
title: Efectos de la educación
author: nan Anónimo
